cont.entity_a: Good value for the price with well-built and well-designed features.
Customizable button commands enhance browsing experience. Software available online for customizing button functions.
cont.entity_b: Precise response with programmable buttons. Not compatible with Mac software for extra button functions.
Terrific feel and function for left-handed use.

cont.entity_a: Small size fits well for users with small hands. Non-ergonomic due to small size, causing discomfort for larger hands. Compact size makes it suitable for travel.
cont.entity_b: Ergonomic design fits left-handed users well.

cont.entity_a: Smooth wheel lacks tactile feedback. Scroll wheel is smooth but can be imprecise for some users.

cont.entity_b: Includes email and instant message notification lights. Ergonomically comfortable with programmable buttons.

cont.entity_a: Corded mouse avoids battery issues common in wireless mice.
cont.entity_b: Weak transmitter requires receiver to be nearby. Comfortable with reliable connection. Non-Bluetooth, occupying a USB port. Good battery life with auto-off feature.
Installation is straightforward with reliable performance.

Functionality.comm: Standard buttons and scroll wheel function properly.

cont.entity_a: Reliable performance and longevity for a corded mouse.
Short cord length may require USB extension for desktop use.
cont.entity_b: Not compatible with Mac software for extra button functions. Does not integrate with Logitech cordless keyboard receivers. Not suitable for gaming due to lag time.
